thread.title: Rob W
thread.title_full: Bundle Stars reviewed by Rob W

author: Rob W
title: Rob W
text:
Bundle Stars is usually a fantastic site to purchase steam keys. Their bundles are usually really good deals, and their deals in general, quite often beat the competition (including Steam's direct sales).
I had a problem with my most recent purchase however, where I attempted to buy the "Borderlands 2 GOTY" and after paying ended up with an original "Borderlands GOTY" key. Customer service is looking into this for me at the moment...
